mapper.select: select count(r.id) as rank, f.furniturenum as furniturenum, f.imgpath as imgpath from itr_record r, itr_furniture f where r.furniturenum = f.furniturenum group by f.furniturenum, f.imgpath order by count(id) desc

select count(r.id) as rank, f.furniturenum as furnitureNum, f.imgpath as imgPath, u.gender as gender, extract(year from u.birth) as birthYear from itr_record r, itr_furniture f, itr_user u where r.furniturenum = f.furniturenum group by f.furniturenum, f.imgpath, u.gender, extract(year from u.birth) order by count(r.id) desc

select count(f.coname) as count,extract(year from r.dates) as year,f.coname as company from itr_record r,itr_furniture f where r.furniturenum=f.furniturenum group by extract(year from dates),f.coname order by extract(year from dates)

select f.coname as coname,r.furniturenum as furniturenum ,f.type as type,count(r.furniturenum) as count from itr_record r,ITR_FURNITURE f where r.furniturenum=f.furniturenum group by r.furniturenum,f.coname,f.type order by coname,count(r.furniturenum) desc

select count(f.coname) as count,extract(year from r.dates) as year,extract(month from r.dates) as month,f.coname as company from itr_record r,itr_furniture f where r.furniturenum=f.furniturenum group by extract(year from r.dates),extract(month from r.dates),f.coname order by extract(year from r.dates)

select f.FURNITURENUM as FURNITURENUM, f.FURNITURENAME as FURNITURENAME, f.type as type, f.color as color,count(r.id) as pick from itr_record r, itr_furniture f where r.FURNITURENUM = f.FURNITURENUM and f.CONAME = #{coId} group by f.furniturenum, r.furniturenum, f.furniturename, f.type, f.color order by count(r.id) desc
